name: Magic Training Prototype
description:
Magic Training Prototype is an early prototype that combines conversation, gameplay, and player agency together into a short vignette. It is designed with two goals in mind:

1 - That you, the player, will enjoy the experience

2 - That I, the creator, will be able to see the game from a fresh perspective through your feedback

The prototype is free for anyone to download. Once you've played it, please fill out this survey. Your feedback will help make future versions even better.
